sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it it given that
\[
	x = \frac{\sqrt{p + 9 q } + \sqrt{p - 9 q }}{\sqrt{p + 9 q } - \sqrt{p - 9 q }}
\]
Now prove that
\[
	9 q x ^2 - 2 p x + 9 q = 0
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "The given equation is
\[
	x = \frac{\sqrt{p + 9 q } + \sqrt{p - 9 q }}{\sqrt{p + 9 q } - \sqrt{p - 9 q }}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now by using componendo and dividendo and simplifying we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s2v1]{} + 1 }{x - 1 } = \frac{2 \sqrt{p + 9 q }}{2 \sqrt{p - 9 q }}
\]
\[
\Rightarrow \frac{(x + 1)^2}{(x - 1)^2} = \frac{p + \input[s2v2]{}q }{p - 9 q }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now using componendo and dividendo again, we get
\[
	\frac{(x + 1)^2 + (x - 1)^2}{(\input[s3v1]{} + 1)^2 - (x - 1)^2} = \frac{(p + 9 q ) + (p - 9 q )}{(p + 9 q ) - (p - 9 q )}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{2\input[s3v2]{}^2 + 2 }{4 x } = \frac{2 p }{18 q }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{x ^2 + 1}{2 \input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{p }{9 q }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 9 q x ^2 + 9 q = 2 \input[s4v2]{} x 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 9 q x ^2 - 2 p x + 9 q = 0
\]
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": ["x", 9], "text": "$$\text{Simplification after applying componendo and dividendo we get $\frac{(x + 1)^2}{(x - 1)^2} = \frac{p + 9 q }{p - 9 q }$}$$"}, {"data": ["x", "x"], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification will give us $\frac{2x ^2 + 2 }{4 x } = \frac{2 p }{18 q }$}$$"}, {"data": ["x", "p"], "text": "$$\text{Cross-multiplication and simplification gets us to $9 q x ^2 + 9 q = 2 p x $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
